description: A new season of the Game of Thrones prequel series returns Sunday night on HBO.
title: ‘House of the Dragon’ is back Sunday. Here’s who to know and what to watch for

description: David Bazan's multi-part memoirs have blurred memories of his adolescence, but with the goal of being honest and accountable. NPR Music critic Ann Powers sees connections between Pedro the Lion's Santa Cruz and Jane Schoenbrun’s new film, I Saw the TV Glow.
title: Pedro the Lion's youthful nostalgia is quietly transformational

description: Like the 2019 novel by Candice Carty-Williams that it’s based on, the Hulu series Queenie – which premiered Friday – explores the quarter-life growing pains of lonely South Londoner, Queenie Jenkins.
title: Queenie’s second life on screen expands its original vision

description: The name of the great contralto and civil rights icon now lives above the doors to the grand hall in Philadelphia’s Kimmel Center for the Performing Arts.
title: Philadelphia Orchestra renames hall after hometown legend Marian Anderson
